title: Bug 14068Views should not hardcode assumptions about open strategy
OB: Build 20020416I noticed several places in the code with the following pattern:boolean activate = OpenStrategy.getOpenMethod() == OpenStrategy.DOUBLECLICK;page.openEditor(marker,activate);This hardcodes the assumption that the only strategy which activates on openis double click.It would be better to ask OpenStrategy whether it should activate on open.E.g. what happens if a new strategy is added which also requires activation?
